body.name: Mini Projector WIFI and bluetooth,1080P protable Projector 18000L Portable Outdoor Movie Projector Compatible with Smartphone/USB/HDMI
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 4 mins
features: 【300’’ Giant Screen & ±15° Keystone Correction】The portable projector features a 4:3/16:9 aspect ratio, 50-100% zoom function, and 15° keystone distortion correction, providing a 30-300 inch projection display at a projection distance of 3.3-13.8 feet, allowing you to enjoy a 300-inch projection size for optimal viewing during outdoor family entertainment activities!

【Native 1080P Full HD resolution】With a resolution of 1920*1080, brightness of 18000 lumens, and a dynamic contrast ratio of 10000:1, the projector displays a clearer, richer, and brighter picture. This full HD projector is an excellent device that can provide you with a great viewing experience.

【Bluetooth 5.1 Function】Built-in upgraded speakers, you can enjoy a theater-quality audio-visual experience. The latest Bluetooth 5.1 chip delivers the best sound and excellent listening experience. With this Bluetooth projector, you can wirelessly connect your Bluetooth speakers or headphones at any time for even better sound. (Bluetooth does not support connection with smartphones.)

【Multimedia Compatibility】Equipped with HDMI, AV, USB, and 3.5mm headphone interfaces, compatible with PS5, Fire Stick, DVD, USB, computer, headphones, external speakers, iPhone, Android, iPad, and other devices, meeting most daily home theater needs such as parties, home theater, and video games.

【LIFETIME CUSTOMER SERVICE SUPPORT】 The projector lamp life is 50,000 hours, perfect for home entertainment, games, yoga and parties. We provide lifetime professional customer service and technical support, if you have any questions about the use of the projector, please contact seller support, we will be online 24/7 for you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CROSEAU Native 1080P Bluetooth Projector This portable projector is equipped with 1080P Supported resolution and 18000 Lumens brightness, which delivers an image quality that is 3 times CLEARER than other mini projectors. Immerse yourself in breathtaking clarity and detail with our high-resolution projector. Designed to deliver stunning visuals, our projector boasts exceptional image quality, bringing every scene to life with vivid colors and sharp, precise details. Explore the full potential of your content and elevate your viewing experiences with our projector, designed to deliver superior image quality that exceeds expectations.

Enhance your visual experience with our exceptional projector Whether you're delivering a presentation, hosting a movie night, or showcasing your creative work, our projector ensures that every detail is displayed in stunning, true-to-life color. With its advanced technology and superior image quality, you can trust our projector to provide an immersive and captivating viewing experience for any occasion. Elevate your visuals and make an impact with our crystal-clear, high-definition projector.

Built-in Hi-Fi Stereo Speaker Immerse yourself in a complete audio-visual experience with our premium projector. Whether you're enjoying a movie night, delivering a presentation, or gaming, our projector's exceptional sound quality enhances every moment, ensuring an immersive and engaging audio-visual journey. Elevate your entertainment and communication with our projector's superior sound performance.

Experience larger-than-life visuals with our premium projector Boasting an expansive screen size, our projector ensures that every image is displayed in impressive detail, creating a truly immersive viewing experience. Whether you're enjoying a movie night, delivering a presentation, or gaming, our projector's generous screen size brings your content to life on a grand scale, captivating audiences and enhancing every visual moment. Elevate your entertainment and communication with our projector's superior display size, making every experience larger and more impactful.

Transform any space into a captivating visual environment with our versatile projector Whether it's for professional presentations, immersive movie nights, or dynamic gaming experiences, our projector adapts seamlessly to various settings, delivering stunning visuals and exceptional performance. With its flexibility and adaptability, our projector is the perfect solution for a wide range of scenarios, ensuring that every visual experience is elevated to new heights. Elevate your entertainment, communication, and presentations with our projector, designed to shine in any setting.

Immerse yourself in a world of possibilities with our versatile projector Immerse yourself in a world of possibilities with our versatile projector, designed to adapt to various placement options. Whether you prefer ceiling mounting, tabletop setup, or rear projection, our projector offers flexibility to accommodate your preferred arrangement, ensuring optimal viewing angles and seamless integration into any space. From professional presentations to home entertainment, our projector's versatile placement options empower you to create the perfect visual environment for any occasion. Experience the freedom to customize your setup and elevate your visual experiences with our adaptable projector, designed to complement your unique needs and preferences.

Explore limitless connectivity options with our versatile projector Whether you prefer wireless, HDMI, USB, or other interfaces, our projector offers multiple connection options to suit your specific needs. From laptops and smartphones to gaming consoles and streaming devices, our projector ensures effortless compatibility, allowing you to share content from diverse sources with ease. Experience the freedom to connect your preferred devices and elevate your visual experiences with our adaptable projector, designed to complement your unique connectivity preferences and enhance every viewing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars awesome quality projector with clear picture
reviews.reviewText: I got this projector for gifting my spouse as a gift. I am happy with the projector, it is easy to set up and works with most of my devices including laptop. The best part of this projector is it's portability and functionality connecting to wi-fi.The visual quality is too good and colors, contrasts are really great as well. Simple to use and comes at a great price.
